channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Infinite Scroll
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Infinite Scroll

item.title: CVE-2022-4466|2024-08-03T01:41:45.000Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20infinite%20scroll
item.description: The WordPress Infinite Scroll WordPress plugin before 5.6.0.3 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
